# setting
 
```{r}
SciViews::R
```

# data
```{r}
stalk_evo <- read("../data/stalk_evo.rds")
flower_evo <- read("../data/flower_evo.rds")


flower_evo <- unite(flower_evo , col = "stalk_flower" , stalk , flower , sep = "_")
```

![](../figure/figure1.jpg)


# Stalk evolution



```{r}
chart(stalk_evo, height ~ day %col=% stalk ) + 
  geom_point() 


```

# flower birth day



```{r}
pander::pander(flow,
               caption = "day of the flower birth")
```


# flower evolution



```{r}
a <- chart(flower_evo, petal_lg ~ age_day ) + geom_point()

b <- chart(flower_evo, male_lg ~ age_day ) + geom_point()

c <- chart(flower_evo, fml_lg ~ age_day ) + geom_point()

combine_charts(list(a,b,c))
```
